Uses of Interface
main.Curve

  • Packages that use Curve 
    Package Description
    main  

    • Uses of Curve in main

      Classes in main with type parameters of type Curve 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  TransformableCurve<T extends Curve>
      A curve that can be transformed
      For each, return a new curve object which should mirror as closely as possible the curve after a transformation
      Accuracy depends on implementation, user should be aware and know what objects they are dealing with
      Subinterfaces of Curve in main 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  TransformableCurve<T extends Curve>
      A curve that can be transformed
      For each, return a new curve object which should mirror as closely as possible the curve after a transformation
      Accuracy depends on implementation, user should be aware and know what objects they are dealing with
      Classes in main that implement Curve 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractCurve
      Extension of Curve with some useful methods added
      class  MetaSamples
      Same thing as Samples but with some other useful metadata as well as variables scripts can use
      class  Samples
      Sampled sound
      Methods in main with parameters of type Curve 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Samples.applyCurveTo(Curve curve, double sampleRate, double[] target)
      Apply curve to some array as an envelope
      void Samples.applyCurveToData(Curve curve)
      Apply curve as envelope to sample data
      static void Samples.applyCurveToInParallel(Curve curve, double sampleRate, double[]... targets)
      Apply curve to some arrays as an envelope
      void Samples.applyCurveToSpectrum(Curve curve)
      Apply curve as envelope to spectrum correctly
      Doing the extra calculation is necessary, otherwise the mapping will be wrong.
      T TransformableCurve.transformYFunction(Curve function)
      (x, y) → (x, f(y))
